main event: A metallic object was reported to have fallen on a farm on December 3, 1954.
interesting points: The object made a hole in the earth that was 6 feet wide, 4 feet deep, and 52 feet long., The farmer hauled it to a center and sold it to General Electric for $70., The report suggests the object was a balloon, which contradicts the description of a meteorite., The sighting was documented in multiple pages of Project Blue Book records., Another sighting was reported over Hamilton, Alabama, on November 5, 1955.
witness description: A farmer who reported the sighting.
